definition: to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The picture appeared in all the Chinese newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 那张照片遍布中国所有的报纸。

sentences.english: Inside the Wolf's foot, the stony horizon.
sentences.chinese: 在狼的蹄子内部，是石头遍布的地平线。

sentences.english: Brush 3 coasts dispersing the crystals evenly.
sentences.chinese: 施釉三遍及均匀地遍布结晶体。

sentences.english: Ribbon lakes and bogs are present throughout the area, created by depressions left by receding glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 冰川退化后形成的丝带状的湖泊和沼泽遍布这一地区。

sentences.english: Maintenance depots across the country, giving you more at ease use.
sentences.chinese: 遍布全国的维修站，让您更放心的使用。

sentences.english: The widespread availability of free or very low cost development tools makes creating a business almost scarily simple.
sentences.chinese: 遍布的免费或着低成本的发展工具使创业大为简单化。

sentences.english: By 2011, pit mines surrounded the Athabasca River.
sentences.chinese: 到2011年阿萨巴斯卡河两岸已是矿坑遍布。

sentences.english: Railways ramified all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 铁路四通八达遍布全国。

sentences.english: On the path proliferates the fallen flower, puts out a hand to touch is glittering and translucentcarving.
sentences.chinese: 道路上遍布落英，伸手所触尽是晶莹剔透。

sentences.english: Unconsolidated sandstone reservoirs are all over international various oil region .
sentences.chinese: 疏松砂岩油藏遍布于世界的各个油区。

sentences.english: Video-game halls have mushroomed in both big cities and small towns.
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏厅已经遍布大小城市的街头。

sentences.english: The bank has ramification throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行的分支机构遍布世界。

sentences.english: The activity also became much more coordinated throughout the entire ventral striatum.
sentences.chinese: 这个活动变得更和谐的遍布整个腹侧纹状体。

sentences.english: Teeming with wildlife, the park was a good place to nature-watch.
sentences.chinese: 那座公园野生动物遍布，是个观赏大自然的好地方。

sentences.english: The poets and "saints" of medieval bhakti appeared throughout India.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪的巴克提诗人和“圣人”遍布了印度。

sentences.english: Novels such as Lazarillo de Tormes were influential across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 托梅斯的导盲犬等小说的影响遍布了整个欧洲。

definition: to be covered with/to be filled with
scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
